summary: Ross L. Crozier, also known as Agent VAIVADA and Arthur G. Vaivada, was involved in CIA operations, including Project HUMANOID in Costa Rica. The documents span from 1952 to 1975, covering his contract extensions, operational clearance requests, and suitability for contact agent work. He was considered for promotion and his activities included agent work in Mexico and operational contacts in Havana. The documents also contain biographical information, agent evaluations, receipts, and file requests related to his work.
significance: The provided documents do not explicitly mention any connection to the JFK assassination. Ross L. Crozier's significance in this context is not apparent from the given information.
